articles.title: Chinese envoy seeks Nollywood, Asian film industries collaboration - Punch Newspapers
articles.description: The Chinese Ambassador to Nigeria, Cui Jinachun, has called for collaboration between Nollywood and Asian film industries, to produce works that would promote harmony, peace and unity between both continents.
articles.content:
Jinachun made the call at the opening of the Fourth Asian Film Festival and movie screening in Abuja on Monday.

articles.title: Inclusive product design: Toys that help visually impaired kids explore food - Channel NewsAsia
articles.description: While most of us take eating for granted, many visually impaired babies develop an aversion to mushy or slimy foods. CNA Women speaks to Lim Jin Ying about how inclusive design can help such babies and children overcome these and other common barriers.
articles.content:
DESIGNING FOR THE VISUALLY IMPAIRED
With so many mass-produced items in the market today, few designers design for this relatively small group of visually impaired people.
